Name: Battle Imagine - Eye King
Description:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of the Eye King - Arcane! Assault Turret.

Arcane! Assault Turret
Summon Elite - Inspecting Floating Eye, continuously shooting at the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Description$english:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of the Eye King - Arcane! Assault Turret.

Arcane! Assault Turret
Summon Elite - Inspecting Floating Eye, continuously shooting at the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
